::Rippersnapper::
Ripppersnapper arrives at the scene and pounces on the piece of 
Symphony's arm that is in the mouth of Sinnertwin, "RIP RIP RIP... 
I RIP!"

On 16 Mar 2001, at 23:38, rAuq wrote:

> ::Rippersnapper::
> Rippersnapper had just uncovered himself from the debri that had 
> covered him in the crash. He gets up and looks around. Not seeing 
> any other bots, he leaves the craft, "Me hungry..." He picks up the 
> smell of the other Terrocons, "ME RIP, AND RIP, AND .... RIP," He 
> runs out of descriptive words. He leaps down the created path 
> following the familiar scent.
> 
>
